item.title: Phản hồi cho T1 Circle Pendant bởi duong
item.dc:creator: duong
item.description: I’m a bigger girl with a thicker neck and it fits. I would add an extender for a little length but I love it. Its very delicate and pretty.
item.content:encoded: I’m a bigger girl with a thicker neck and it fits. I would add an extender for a little length but I love it. Its very delicate and pretty.

item.title: Phản hồi cho T1 Circle Pendant bởi duong
item.dc:creator: duong
item.description: So cute and comes with a little gold chain as well! They even sent a little note card which came so in handy because i forgot a card for this gift! Love this!
item.content:encoded: So cute and comes with a little gold chain as well! They even sent a little note card which came so in handy because i forgot a card for this gift! Love this!

item.title: Phản hồi cho Ball Bypass Bracelet bởi duong
item.dc:creator: duong
item.description: I liked the bracelet very much. Elegant and gorgeous. Delivered very quickly. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: I liked the bracelet very much. Elegant and gorgeous. Delivered very quickly. Thanks.

item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://en.gravatar.com/">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.
